title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: This is a vintage camera that has been used for capturing many special moments.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: This was used by Duran DUran band in their early stage shows. Later, they have gifted this to a fan in the early 2000.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: First generation apple computer that was way ahead of its time. Still functional and in tip top condition. No repair made, only processor change.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: A watch that will make you feel rich, fine crafted, an example of craftmanship, elegence and personality. A rare combination to add in your collection.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: Lounge chair that was used by Count of Earl and Duke of Nottingham. Still used and admired. A combination of fine arts and durability.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A book that has moved a lot person and lat us think about love in a different way. Mint condition, no repair needed.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: It was said that a print of Banksy will prove your taste in people. A beautiful art that was designed by the original Banksy.

title: Antic Gold Dial Phone
description: Designed by the Germans in the late 70's, it was used by the Sheikh of Duabi. A collection that will enrich your legacy.
